response: Welcome to Ola's subscription offerings. Our Ola Care and Ola Care Plus plans provide peace of mind with annual scooter diagnostics, towing, puncture and theft assistance, and more, all free of charge. We also offer 24/7 ambulance service, online doctor consultations, and hotel accommodation in case of breakdowns. With our extended warranty, you can extend your scooter's warranty to five years, covering any manufacturing defects. We also have a range of accessories and merchandise available for purchase. Join the Ola revolution today for a hassle-free and comprehensive scooter experience.
